`Impossible reorg` running the merge test vectors on `merge-kiln` using https://github.com/status-im/nimbus-eth2/blob/unstable/scripts/check_merge_test_vectors.sh

author: tersec
content: those are just the merge test vectors copied into a shell script

author: mariusvanderwijden
content: Again, this is just a weird error message (since setHead breaks an assumption that we previously had), you can just ignore it
